activity_id.name: activity_id
activity_id.description: an identifier of different CORDEX activities as dynamical downscaling (DD) or empirical- statistical downscaling (ESD). **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS.**

comment.name: comment
comment.description: additional information about the data or methods used to produce the simulation

contact.name: contact
contact.description: contact information of the institution that is responsible for CORDEX simulations (avoid personal contact information)

Conventions.name: Conventions
Conventions.description: Climate and Forecast (CF) metadata conventions version

creation_date.name: creation_date
creation_date.description: date when the file was created in format  YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

domain_id.name: domain_id
domain_id.description: an identifier assigned to each CORDEX region including a flag for resolution.  **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS.**

driving_experiment.name: driving_experiment
driving_experiment.description: short description of the  reanalysis-driven experiment or the driving CMIP6 experiment
driving_experiment.examples: "evaluation run with reanalysis forcing", "all-forcing simulation of the recent past", "gap-filling scenario reaching 7.0 based on SSP3"  (see [reference CV](https://github.com/WCRP-CORDEX/cordex-cmip6-cv/blob/main/CORDEX-CMIP6_driving_experiment_id.json))

driving_experiment_id.name: driving_experiment_id
driving_experiment_id.description: an identifier of the  reanalysis-driven experiment or the driving CMIP6 experiment.  **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS.**

driving_institution_id.name: driving_institution_id
driving_institution_id.description: an identifier of the institution that is responsible for the driving reanalysis or CMIP6 simulation

driving_source_id.name: driving_source_id
driving_source_id.description: reanalysis or CMIP6 model identifier  **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS**.

driving_variant_label.name: driving_variant_label
driving_variant_label.description: variant_label of the CMIP6 simulation or driving reanalysis.  **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS**.

frequency.name: frequency
frequency.description: sampling frequency **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS.**

grid.name: grid
grid.description: provides information about the horizontal grid and regridding procedure

history.name: history
history.description: a timestamped trail for modifications to the original data, as suggested by the CF conventions

institution.name: institution
institution.description: full name of the institution that is responsible for CORDEX simulations

institution_id.name: institution_id
institution_id.description: an identifier of the institution that is responsible for CORDEX simulations **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS.**

mip_era.name: mip_era
mip_era.description: determines what cycle of CMIP defines experiment and data specifications

project_id.name: project_id
project_id.description: project identifier  **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS**.

references.name: references
references.description: published or web-based references that describe the data, model or methods used

source_id.name: source_id
source_id.description: model identifier (acronym) **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS**.

variable_id.name: variable_id
variable_id.description: variable identifier **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS.**

version_realization.name: version_realization
version_realization.description: identifies versions of CORDEX datasets and RCM realizations  **Used in faceted searches, part of DRS**.

version_realization_info.name: version_realization_info
version_realization_info.description: description of version_realization if it is not "v1-r1"
